1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir bin Samurah said:"A man asked the Prophet whether he could perform prayer in a garment in which he had intercourse with his wife. He said: 'Yes, unless he sees something on it, in which case he should wash it

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي الثَّوْبِ الَّذِي يُجَامِعُ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Offering prayer in a garment in which one has had intercourse
